Welcome to the 10,000 Games Collection!

Thank You for Your Purchase!

You now have access to over 10,000 unique games spanning multiple genres. This collection represents the cutting edge of entertainment technology!

Getting Started

  1. Browse the game launcher to find games that interest you
  2. Play games to earn tokens based on your performance
  3. Use tokens to unlock special features and upgrades
  4. Progress through the Neural Core to unlock advanced tools
  5. Optimize and automate your favorite games for maximum efficiency!

What Are Tokens?

Tokens are the primary reward currency. You earn tokens by:

  • Completing games with good performance
  • Achieving high scores
  • Finding efficient strategies
  • Completing games quickly

The better you play, the more tokens you earn!

Special Features

As you progress, you'll unlock powerful tools:

  • Virtual Machines - Automate game play using recorded demos
  • CheatEngine - Modify game parameters to optimize token generation
  • Neural Core - Feed tokens to unlock levels and new capabilities
  • Statistics Tracking - View detailed performance metrics

System Requirements

Operating System: Windows 98 or newer

RAM: 32 MB minimum

Hard Drive: 50 MB free space

Display: 800x600 resolution minimum
